content: Hugo on Vercel With no doubt, today is a significant date for the cbksb universe has beed updated. It is a step for me, but a huge step for the cbk. Nothing could be bettere than spreading such a awesome thing. I hope the whole human could enjoy the joy of cbksb. Centainly, it has already beyond a simple website, and do is a spirit. At last, i wanna say all the people like cbksb are brothers!
